segments.text: Why do you say so ? Can I see your new car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course you can . ( Lead Carl to his garage . )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , this new car is dynamite ! It is a shiny , beautiful car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My car is simply a daisy . It drives smoothly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The car has very sleek lines . I love it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad to hear that . I'm really pleased with it .
segments.speaker: S2
